website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful little small-space fountain at a price to fit the budget.
pros: Made from a polyresin for durability and color options you don't get with stone fountains
This fountain is only 21 inches long and 13.9 inches wide
A nice way to add the soothing sound of water to small spaces
cons: For a small fountain, it can hold a lot of water and tends to get heavy when full
Make sure you have it mounted properly on the wall

customer_reviews.title: Let the waters flow
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delightful. Very easy to put together. Provided a very nice visual for my front enterance. I have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Wall Fountain
customer_reviews.text: By itself, this wall fountain is pretty nice but with a little creativity, it can be even better. It is a very nice addition to the Florida room. The sound from pouring water is very serene and does not interfere with conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond W Soleau

customer_reviews.title: Wall fountain
customer_reviews.text: This product was not the easiest to assemble. The product needs special screws and tool to be hung. You will need heavy duty screws with anchors and or strong metal hanging hooks. You will also need a well made hammer. Once the product is filled with water it becomes heavy. It requires good support. It is a beautiful picturesque fountain. It gives a very Tranquill relaxing sound. The motor has a very soft sound. The motor has a very relaxing hum that is not over powering. The motor sounds like a small fish tank filter maybe either softer. The fountain itself overall is beautiful and will add beauty to any room and can transform a room into a relaxing oasis.
customer_reviews.author: atiya Neely

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than i expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the fountain and it looks really nice. A few things though... It is not loud at all so if your looking for that waterfall sound it may dissapoint. The hole in the smallest pot was not big enough and it was not draining water. I had to drill it larger. Its my fault i didnt pay more attention to the size posted. Its a pretty small fountain
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Pump Missing, but great price on "used, like new".
customer_reviews.text: Great price but is it great because the pump is missing? Could find no way to ask Amazon if they could just send me the pump. I got at a discount "used, like new condition" from Amazon Fulfillment Services (is that the warehouse, a return from a previous customer?). The price is too good to send back only to be told I have to pay full price to get one with a pump. I will purchase a pump and install myself. The fountain is quite attractive and will go very nicely in my garden with my other fountains. Prime customer for YEARS, first disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Barry on the Border

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this water fountain
customer_reviews.text: First, this was much cheaper on Amazon than another popular site. But having said that, this "fountain" is great. The sound is so soothing and the water flow is adjustable. We do not hang it on the wall but we have it sitting on a table in our patio and it works fine there. It also works sitting on the concrete. So glad I purchased it! Our dogs love to lay in front of it and nap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is beautiful and love the sound it makes without any water splatters
customer_reviews.author: Red Mare

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Fountain!
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the picture and operates as described. I think this looks great on my porch and I like the way it sounds,
customer_reviews.author: mcmc

customer_reviews.title: Not even flow
customer_reviews.text: Not all of the pots have water coming out of them . Continually unblocking the far right pot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Project!
customer_reviews.text: Im in love. I wanted a small water feature that would add major touch but not take a lot of space. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compact fountain for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size and the sound is soothing. Good fountain for the price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Celia Ayala

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Performs as described, easy to set up, rustic-appearing craftsmanship. We added this fountain to our patio primarily for the running-gurgling water sound and it is great! The pump can be adjusted to limit (or eliminate) any "splash" zone. It would be nice to have a water-level indicator (transparent section perhaps?) without having to move the fountain from its mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Randall DeMattei

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my wall everything works great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Macias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with it, it goes so well with my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Haven't hung it up yet but the product is nice. Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Fountain colors didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Under 5 hours of outdoor direct sunlight a day for about a year, everything work fine but the color of the fountain faded badly, all the pots now have the same base color.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tran
